title: check for distributed request after running prepare for search components
description: Do the check for distributed after running prepare for search components so that they can affect whether and how the request will be distributed

comments.author: Brian Choi
comments.content: Please check the issue https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SOLR-3912. Query is being distributed even though there is only one shard.
